"Geesthacht is blooming" is a campaign by Nabu in cooperation with the city administration.

Wikipedia:
Tap dance was established in the 19th century.

Deutsche Bank CEO Christian Sewing considers further interest rate hikes absolutely necessary in the fight against high inflation rates.
The inflationary risks remain high.
"The cost of energy can easily rise again, and the opening up of China can also temporarily boost prices," Sewing told "Welt am Sonntag".

The European Central Bank (ECB) raised interest rates in the Eurozone for the fifth consecutive time at the beginning of February and indicated a further increase of another 0. 5 percentage points for the meeting on March 16th.
The prime interest rate in the Eurozone is now at 3. 0 percent.
The deposit rate that commercial banks receive when they park money at the ECB is 2. 5 percent.
Higher interest rates make loans more expensive.
This can curb demand and thus counteract high inflation rates.
Higher credit interest rates can also lead to investments being postponed, thus weakening economic growth.
Rising interest rates are a burden for heavily indebted Eurozone countries such as Italy.
"The consequences of sustained high inflation are much more severe than the higher financing costs for some countries," said Sewing.
"Of course, we must keep this in mind, but a high level of debt should not prevent the ECB from taking consistent action.
The ECB aims for price stability in the euro area in the medium term at an inflation rate of two percent.
This target mark has been far away for months.
In January, the price surge weakened again, however, consumer prices in the currency area of the now 20 countries were 8. 5 percent above the level of the same month last year.
Higher inflation rates reduce the purchasing power of consumers, because they can afford less for one euro.
Significantly increased energy prices, which drive inflation considerably, are also a burden for businesses.
If inflation remains high, private consumption will "collapse sooner or later," warned Sewing, who is also president of the Federal Association of German Banks (BdB).
In that, I currently see the greatest danger to the German economy.
But I am optimistic that we can avoid this scenario.
Bosch's CEO Stefan Hartung hopes for a broad debate on the "Germany Pace" for infrastructure projects announced by Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD).

Union warns of the dismantling of the Bayer Group
The Chemical Union IG BCE warns of a breakup of the conglomerate after a announced change in leadership at Bayer.

"From the employees' perspective, Bayer is perfectly positioned with its three pillars to meet the challenges of the future," said Francesco Grioli, board member of the union and Bayer supervisory board, to the "Rheinische Post" (Saturday edition).
What is meant are the pharmaceutical business with prescription drugs, the consumer health sector with over-the-counter drugs, and the agricultural business.
The controversial head Werner Baumann will vacate the position this summer.
Bill Anderson, the former pharmaceutical chief of the Swiss rival Roche, is expected to take over in early June.
Baumann has been under criticism for a long time.
The 2018 acquisition of the US seed producer Monsanto for 63 billion dollars is still haunting the manager.
With the purchase, the people of Leverkusen had brought expensive legal disputes about alleged cancer risks of the weed killer glyphosate into their house.
The Bayer stock had been in a downward spiral for years.
In 2019, the shareholders even refused to discharge the CEO at the general meeting.
It was already known for some time that Baumann does not intend to extend his contract, which was originally supposed to run until 2024.
Long-term oriented strategic investors had applied pressure.
Lastly, several activist Anglo-Saxon investors such as Bluebell Capital also got involved.
According to a media report, Bluebell is pushing for a split of the corporation.
The very small fund with an unknown stake in Bayer is known for its aggressive approach.
"A spin-off of the Consumer Health division could be a potential way to increase the company's value," said Markus Manns, fund manager at Union Investment, to the "Rheinische Post".
However, he does not consider a spin-off of the much larger agricultural division Crop Science to be feasible.
Hundreds of thousands want to protest against pension reform.
Paris
The French plan to protest against the planned pension reform again on Saturday.
The unions are opposing a government project with massive protests in the streets.
Hundreds of thousands want to protest against the pension reform again on Saturday.
In France, hundreds of thousands of people are expected to take to the streets again on Saturday, wanting to protest against President Emmanuel Macron's planned pension reform.
For the fourth time, the unions are mobilizing against the plans of the centrist government to raise the retirement age from 62 to 64 years old.
Twice already, over a million people have taken to the streets and there have been nationwide strikes.
Last Tuesday, 750,000 participants were counted at protests.
A turbulent debate has been ongoing in the parliament for a week over the controversial reform.

Already now, many people in France work longer than until the age of 62, if they have not paid into their pension for long enough to qualify for a deduction-free retirement upon reaching the age limit.
In many strenuous professions, people could hardly work any longer, opponents of the reform believe.
Moreover, the employees wanted to be able to enjoy their well-deserved retirement and not completely wear out their health at work.
Macron: Looming Deficit in Pension Fund
Macron justifies the reform with an impending deficit in the pension fund.
Because the population is getting older, employees would have to cover an increasing number of retirees with their contributions.
In order for the pension amount to be kept stable, the population needs to work a bit more.
The critics question the government's calculations and demand that the state must find other sources of money to keep the pension system in balance.
However, it's not only the retirement age that the government wants to adjust.
The already decided years ago increase in the necessary payment duration for a full pension is supposed to be accelerated.
Moreover, individual pension systems with privileges for certain professional groups are to be abolished.
The minimum pension is supposed to increase to about 1200 euros.
The pension reform is considered one of President Macron's most important projects.
During the Corona pandemic, a first attempt to implement the reform was abandoned, even then there were massive protests and strikes.
Since Macron's camp no longer has an absolute majority in parliament, they are hoping to pass the reform with the help of the conservative Républicains, who have announced their support.
And even greater than the fear of a close vote, at the moment Macron is likely most worried about paralyzing strikes.

Before the renewed demonstrations on Saturday, the president said that he could rely on the responsibility of the organizers to ensure they proceeded calmly and did not lead to a blockade of the country.
A powerful high pressure area is located over Central Europe and is determining the weather in Germany.
Does this mean that we can expect a lot of sunshine everywhere?
Offenbach
Offenbach
In Germany, calm high-pressure weather is expected at least until the middle of the week.
Indeed, this high will shift a little to the east over the course of next week.
However, it continues to dictate the weather in Germany.
However, quiet high-pressure weather in winter does not necessarily mean sunny weather, says Übel.
Such a high can even be quite nasty and bestow people in the lowlands with days of dreary high fog gray, while there is pure sun in the high altitudes of the mid-mountain ranges.
The Sunday starts foggy and overcast in most regions.
From the Ore Mountains and the Thuringian Forest to Lower Bavaria, it could still rain a bit according to the DWD.
Above all at the edge of the Alps, but also in the southwest and parts of the west, the cloud cover loosens up throughout the day and the sun increasingly appears.
In the rest of the country, it remains heavily overcast or covered with high fog.
The temperatures reach 4 to 9 degrees, around 10 degrees near the Rhine.
"On Monday, the gradually strengthening sun will nibble at the high fog again and can dissolve it more and more throughout the day," says the meteorologist.

At the edge of the Alps, in the high-altitude regions of the central mountain ranges and in parts of North Rhine-Westphalia, sun is expected all day long, elsewhere it has to fight its way through the high fog cover.
The maximum temperatures range from 5 to 9 degrees, around 11 degrees are expected in the Lower Rhine area, whereas only about 3 degrees are anticipated in the persistently gray southeast.
A weak wind is blowing from various directions.
On Tuesday, in some lowlands, there may once again only be slow clearing of fog or high fog.
Otherwise, the weather appears clear after the fog lifts.
In high altitudes, in large parts of NRW and at the edge of the Alps, the sun is expected to shine all day according to forecasts.
The temperatures climb to between 5 and 11 degrees depending on the sunshine.

1. General
This game illustrates the combat action from the view of a tank driver.
The battles are fought in a wide valley, which is completely enclosed by mountains and volcanoes.
In the valley floor, there are rock pyramids and rock blocks that provide the player with temporary protection, as they cannot be destroyed by enemy shots.
The opponent is represented by slow-moving tracked vehicles and fast super-tanks, as well as nimble rockets that become increasingly difficult to hit during the extended course of the game.
Additionally, UFOs appear at regular intervals.
These cannot attack the player tank.
Conversely, the player can achieve a high score by hitting a UFO.
The device BATTLEZONE has five (5) different operating modes.
These are the attraction sequence, the game introduction sequence, the game sequence, the initial input for highest scores and the self-test sequence.
The latter mode of operation represents a specific sequence for checking the controls and the computer function.
4. Course of the Game
The game sequence is triggered when the pressure switch START is activated.
The LED switch remains lit and the game sounds become audible.
If the last player's tank is eliminated by the enemy attacker, a game ends.
The game begins with slowly moving tanks that become visible on the screen.
The player can determine the position of the respective enemy tanks or missiles by paying attention to the displayed text in the upper left hint display angle of their cockpit.
A note could read, for example: OPPONENTS FROM THE RIGHT.
In addition, a point is visible on the far-reaching radar screen, accompanied by a sonar BLIP sound, representing the enemy's position.
The upper, conical surface on the radar screen represents the player's field of view on the underlying screen.
If the opponent is in this area, they can be easily targeted on the screen.
Additionally, the "OPPONENT IN FIRE RANGE" will simultaneously appear on the upper left notification display.
Occasionally, UFOs become visible on the screen, flying over the battlefield.
These are harmless missiles that observe the combat action and can eliminate neither the enemy nor the player's tank.
The flight position of the UFOs cannot be detected by radar.
The UFOs are supposed to round off the combat action and distract the player, as they usually appear simultaneously with enemy tanks or missiles.
UFOs can be eliminated by both the player's tank and the enemy's tank.
A shot made by the player earns him 5,000 points.
When an opponent is hit, the following points are achieved:
For a slowly moving tank 1,000 points, for a rocket 2,000 points and for a super tank 3,000 points.
A super tank drives and turns twice as fast as the player's tank or a slow-moving enemy tank.
Several options give the setter the opportunity to use 2, 3, 4 or even 5 tanks in a game sequence.
Furthermore, after reaching predetermined scores, a bonus tank can be unlocked and the appearance of the rocket can be varied for a more difficult game design.
Details and the exact switch positions of the game sequence selector switch for this adjustment option can be found in the illustration.
5. Initial input for highest scores
If a player exceeds the minimum score in the high score table, he or she can enter three (3) personal initials into the table after the game ends.
The instruction for this is self-explanatory and can be displayed in four languages.

It should be noted that with the initiation of a self-test, pressing the RESET button on the Battlezone Analog Vector-Generator PCB, or an interruption of the mains voltage, the table with the highest results is deleted.
When resetting, the ten (10) highest scores along with their initials are preserved and re-displayed on the screen to challenge further players.
Every score that is over 100,000 is additionally marked with a tank symbol, followed by the initials of the player.
If a player does not enter his or her initials within 60 seconds, dashes will automatically be entered by the computer.
After this, the device switches back to the attraction game sequence.
CONSTRUCTION ARRANGEMENT
New parts
The device BATTLEZONE has five (5) new components.
If you already have experience with ATARI video devices, you should take note of these important differences.
The new parts are: A.
The control lever.
This is a reconstruction of the ATARI joystick.
It was reinforced by several additional ribs in the inner and outer housing part, making this assembly unit more stable and ensuring the proper function of the switch contacts.
Another modification is the rubber centering bellows, which, like a centering spring, always returns the control lever to the middle position.
The microswitches are now attached with self-locking nuts for easier replacement.
B. Two PC Boards.
ATARI's X/Y game circuit was extended over two (2) interconnected boards.
With the help of this switching technology, more lines are produced on the screen at a higher speed, resulting in a uniform and calm image.
C. The Power Supply.
Battlezone is equipped with a newly constructed power supply.
It has a larger, more powerful transformer to cover the increased power supply provided by the expansion of the circuit.
D.
The device housing.
Due to the new design, it was now possible to install a new cash register with a larger coin capacity.
Furthermore, the device includes a console intended as a platform for smaller players to facilitate playing.
At the same time, this console ensures maximum device stability at the installation site.
These new components, as well as all other main assemblies of this device, are shown in Figure 1.
If one of these new parts is mentioned in the manual, you will find this symbol.
2. Device Inspection
After removing the packaging, this new entertainment device is ready to play.
Nevertheless, you should carry out a certain review to complete the quality control.
To ensure that the device has been delivered to you in proper condition, the following checks should be carried out:
NOTE:
Do not yet connect the device to the 220 V network.
A. Inspect the outside of the case for damages.
B. Open the maintenance flap of the device and check the components within the device as follows:
Check all wiring harness connectors for proper and secure connection.
Potential outstanding or Connect loose plugs together.
NOTE:
Never forcefully make plug connections.
The plugs are equipped with a forced guidance system to ensure a correct connection is made.
A plug connection turned 180 degrees destroys the PCB.
Check the plug connections to the gaming PC board for correct and secure fit.
Note the manufacturing number of the device on the type plate on the back of the device.
Check whether the embossed production number matches those of the Battlezone Analog Vector Generator PC board, auxiliary PC board, Control/Audio II PC board, and TV monitor.
An illustration of the location of the manufacturing number can be found on the back cover of this manual.
This number should always be provided when you call your dealer for further service information.
Check all other main components such as the power supply, control console, and TV monitor for proper assembly.
Finally, the device must be supplied with mains voltage and switched on.
With a glance through the player's sight glass, it should be checked whether the radar screen is also located in the bright, orange-encircled opening of the casing.
If the opening is not exactly centered, the casing attached with adhesive tape must be loosened and realigned.
Before the device is connected to the power supply, it must be ensured that the voltage selection plug on the power supply 1 (see Fig. 3) matches the local mains voltage.

The following provides a series of tips that can help you resolve most problems associated with current DirectX games.
Checking the system configuration
Please take the time and check whether your system meets the requirements listed on the package.
With the help of the DirectX diagnostic tool, you can get an overview of your system if you are unsure whether your PC meets the requirements.
Please proceed as follows to call up the DirectX diagnostic program:
Now the user interface of the DirectX diagnostic program is displayed.
Among other things, you can check whether the graphics and sound are working correctly by clicking on the corresponding buttons to test DirectDraw, Direct3D, and DirectSound.
Note: If you do not have advanced computer skills, we would advise against changing any of the options in the DirectX diagnostic program.
Before starting the game
It can happen that other programs take over the system resources needed for the game to run smoothly.
It's not obvious for all of these programs that they are active, and many are started automatically when the system boots up.
In some cases, they can be the reason why your program hangs or crashes.
Therefore, we recommend that you close such background applications before starting the game.
To do this, look for the program's icon in the Windows taskbar.
Clean up the system
Before you install software, it must be ensured that your hard drive is functioning optimally.
The tools you need are included with Windows: Use ScanDisk, Defragmentation, and Disk Cleanup to ensure everything runs smoothly.
Then the chances are high that current games will run largely without problems on your PC.
Consult the Windows help files to learn about the tools ScanDisk or error checking, defragmentation, and disk cleanup.
The use of the Windows help
You will then receive instructions explaining how you can use these tools.
The game crashes or hangs?
For games that use the latest version of DirectX, you should make sure you have the latest drivers for your graphics card.
This way, you can often prevent a game from crashing or freezing.
In the following, you will find the latest graphics card manufacturers:
How to end all unnecessary background applications
Important note:
After ending the game, you should reactivate the background applications by restarting your PC.
This will automatically reactivate all background applications that you have terminated.

INTRODUCTORY WORDS TO FAHRENHEIT

The desire to develop video games was sparked in me by the advent of 3D real-time technology, which suddenly opened up a wealth of new possibilities and appeared to me as a new means of expression, with which one could push the world to its limits.
She represented an opportunity for me to discover new horizons.
I felt like a cinematic pioneer at the beginning of the 20th century.
Century ago:
To be completely honest, the next ten years could not satisfy my hunger.
Meanwhile, technology continued to make rapid progress.
Fahrenheit represents my contribution to making video games a true means of conveying emotions.
Even though this could have happened in a completely different form, Fahrenheit's greatest merit is the fact that real questions are raised and concrete answers are offered here.

Fahrenheit is proof that one can indeed create an interactive gaming experience that is not just based on fighting hideous monsters in dark corridors and shooting at boxes to obtain ammunition, but also possesses far more sophisticated and profound content.
It is proof that one can both tell a story and offer game content without having to sacrifice the narrative or interactive elements.
I hope that both hardcore gamers and casual players will enjoy this new gaming experience.
If you are rather skeptical about video games, I hope that Fahrenheit contributes to changing your attitude in this regard.
May other developers also feel the desire to embark on this new creative path and enrich it with their own inspirations, talent, and ambition.
Interactivity is still in its infancy and offers the opportunity to yet discover everything.

Over the past two years, Fahrenheit has filled a large part of our lives and represented an unforgettable interpersonal and intellectual adventure for the entire Quantic Dream team, in which we were repeatedly forced to question many of the principles previously considered immutable.
David Cage

FAILURE

TROUBLESHOOTING and SETTINGS
Start of the test method.
Press the "Sub-Test" button or the "Self-Test" button (SW 1 near the LED display).
All LEDs should light up and the hardware test can begin.
The tests and settings can be entered for each program display, by pressing the "Test" button, the next program will always be displayed.
If a continuous test of the video board is desired, the self-test button must be pressed twice in order for the video test to begin in the auto-test mode.
In this program, the device will continuously perform the hardware test until it is shut down.
When the J 19 plug is disconnected, the memory is protected and the CMOS RAM test video cannot be performed.
Hardware
Tests:
These tests are conducted as follows:
O = off / I = on / X = test results
The ROM checksum calculates the checksum of every video ROM and compares it with the checksum stored for this ROM.
If a difference is present, the device stops and the value of the ROM with the incorrect checksum appears on the LEDs.
If the checksum of ROM is faulty, U 10 is displayed first.
If this test fails, the next ROM displayed on the LED display must be replaced.
The E-PROM memory in a given game can be introduced as banks (series) of either 2716 or 2732 E-PROMs.
The E-PROM type for each series is selected by the decoder plug (26-00002-016 for 2716 or 26-00002-032 for 2732).
Communications RAM from the Video Board

The Communications RAM test determines the functional reliability of the memory shared by two processors by storing predetermined series of numbers in the RAM and then checking if the storage was correct.
LED value: 00 0010
If the Gerdt with the above-mentioned.
The display holds, an error has been detected.
If the communications RAMs fail during the video board test, the error could be caused by defective wiring (RAM) or errors in the data board.
To locate the error, remove the data board from P 6 and repeat the test.
A failure means: errors in the U 3, U 4 or associated circuits.
Video Board CMOS RAM
After values have been written into another part of the memory, the CMOS RAM is checked in the same way as the Communications RAM.
If the test was passed, all memory locations will be reset to their previous value.
LED value: 00 0011
If the device stops with the above mentioned display, there is an error.
In this case, check U 85 and U 86 and the associated circuits.
The Decoding.
Check the video board color RAM by storing predetermined number sequences in the color RAM.
These numbers that will follow are checked for accuracy upon reading back.
LED Value: 00 0100
If this value is displayed, there is an error.
Check U 56, U 57, associated multiplexers and decoders.
Video Board (Display RAM).
The display RAM is checked by writing a pattern on each page.
The results of these registrations are compared with the original pattern.
Any discrepancy causes the program to stop and the LEDs indicate the faulty RAM.
If a display RAM fails, diagnose the problem and replace the RAM.
If this error diagnosis does not indicate a RAM failure (00 0101 on LEDs), it shows that the next check is being initiated (Data Hardware).
The connection to the data processor must be present and it must be functional.

Taylor has been raving about Volt for so long, finally admits everything, and then acts like a small child and withdraws during every argument?!

At the same time, there were also inconsistencies, in my opinion, because at the end of the second part, Volt was still trying to convince Taylor's ex and did not believe him when he said that Taylor was into him and tried to convince the ex that Taylor couldn't manage without him and that he himself had heard it.
But at the beginning of the third part, Volt seems to have forgotten everything and is fighting for Taylor.

a quiet, sensitive movie

I doubt the frequency response.
I bought this speaker for the shower when my smaller complimentary speaker, which I received as a promotional gift, unfortunately broke.
In general, the Onforu works great, it's waterproof (already fell into the shower), produces bass as bass should be, Bluetooth works great.
Of course you have to wet the suction cup, otherwise it will come off.
It can play sound very loud.
.. yes.
What I critically see is the frequency response of this small speaker.
As said, bass is reproduced as bass and not converted into a higher frequency.
However, this causes a problem.
Some frequencies are reproduced very loudly, while others remain very quiet.
While some frequencies of the song almost hurt the ears, higher and lower frequencies are just barely audible.
My old speaker may not have reproduced bass sound well, but the frequencies were represented quite naturally in terms of volume.
Unfortunately, that's not really the case with Onforu, which I find a bit annoying.
Therefore, I have to deduct a star for this.
I just expected more from the frequency response.
